profile.name: José Valim
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | Elixir Expert | Open Source Enthusiast
profile.summary: Highly motivated and experienced software engineer with a strong passion for building scalable applications using Elixir. Proven track record of contributing to open source projects and driving technical discussions around language features and type systems.
profile.company: Based on the provided information, I would recommend GitLab as a potential employer for José Valim.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer at GitLab
description: Designed and developed multiple applications using Elixir, leveraging the power of Plug and Ecto.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions on time.
Participated in technical discussions around language features and type systems, driving innovation and improvement.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed multiple applications using Elixir for various clients, delivering high-quality software solutions.
Contributed to open source projects, including [2022-01-14] On elixir-plug/plug: :green_heart: :blue_heart: :purple_heart: :yellow_heart: :heart:
Participated in technical discussions around language features and type systems, sharing knowledge with the Elixir community.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained multiple open source projects using Elixir, ensuring their stability and security.
Contributed to the development of [2020-01-14] On elixir-ecto/ecto_sql: :green_heart: :blue_heart: :purple_heart: :yellow_heart: :heart:
Collaborated with other maintainers to drive technical discussions and improve the overall quality of the projects.
